mapping.name: 河北联通资源情况_小区(GSM)_%%Y.%%M.%%D.xlsx
mapping.templet: 河北联通资源情况_小区(GSM)
mapping.sql: SELECT TO_CHAR(P.START_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') "时间", P.CITY_NAME "城市名称", C.COUNTY_NAME "行政区", P.VENDOR_NAME "厂家", P.RELATED_BSCNAME "BSC名称", P.RELATED_BTSNAME "基站名称", P.LAC "LAC", P.CI "CI", P.CHINA_NAME "小区名称", CASE WHEN NVL(SUM(WIRE_LOAD), 0) + NVL(SUM(CONFIG_DEDICATED_PDCH), 0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((NVL(SUM(T_TRAFFIC), 0) + NVL(SUM(DL_BUSY_PDCH_MEAN), 0)) * 100 / (NVL(SUM(WIRE_LOAD), 0) + NVL(SUM(CONFIG_DEDICATED_PDCH), 0)), 4) END "无线资源利用率", ROUND(SUM(T_TRAFFIC), 4) "TCH话务量", CASE WHEN NVL(SUM(TCH_F_AVAIL_CARRIER), 0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(T_TRAFFIC) / SUM(TCH_F_AVAIL_CARRIER), 4) END "TCH每线话务量" FROM PERF_CELL_G P, DS_PERF_BUSY_CELL_D D, CFG_COUNTY C WHERE P.START_TIME = D.BT_DAY_T_TRAFFIC_DL_BUSY_PDCH AND P.NE_SYS_ID = D.NE_CELL_ID AND P.ADM_AREA = C.COUNTY_ID AND D.START_TIME = TO_DATE('%%Y-%%M-%%D %%H:%%m:%%S', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') --需要每天取数据 如10月8号 取10月7号 数据 GROUP BY P.START_TIME, P.LAC, P.CI, P.CHINA_NAME, P.RELATED_BTSNAME, P.RELATED_BSCNAME, P.CITY_NAME, C.COUNTY_NAME, P.VENDOR_NAME
